entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:49 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas before morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight then northwest 50 gusting to 70. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Windy. High zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
